forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 52. Southwest wind around 7 mph.

forecast.name: Tuesday
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly sunny, with a high near 61. Southwest wind 7 to 13 mph.

weather_report:
As dawn breaks gently across Downtown San Francisco, the air whispers of a cool, cloudy night now yielding to a slightly brighter morning. The clouds form a textured tapestry overhead, casting a tranquil shadow over the city, while a subtle southwest wind hums softly through the streets, carrying with it the promise of a pleasant day ahead. With temperatures hovering in the low fifties, the atmosphere invites a moment of pause, urging you to embrace a light outer layer before stepping out into the awakening world.

As the day unfolds, expect the sun to break through the clouds, dancing playfully with the cool breezes to create an invigorating experience. By midday, the city will welcome a high near sixty-one, sufficient enough to stir the spirits of inhabitants. While fog may linger along the edges of the Bay, partially shrouding the illustrious Golden Gate, it carries an essence of mystery and allure, making the views all the more breathtaking. This morning is well suited for a thoughtful stroll through the Presidio, or perhaps a quiet read at a café with a view, as the promise of clearer skies emerges. Don a light jacket or sweater for warmth, and take a moment to savor the flavors of the city’s vibrant life as it stirs back to life.
